short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Domain Lemonade helps to find quality domains in mins. Input 15 words, the algorithm checks availability of 200+ domain combinations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Long Description:

When life gives you lemons, buy stellar domains.

Domain Lemonade helps you quickly identify quality domains in minutes.

Here’s how it works:
-- Input 15 words
-- Select “Submit and Search”

That’s it!

Our search algorithm will check the availability of 200+ potential domain combinations using the Dynadot domain platform.

-------
Extension Features:
-- See before you search: Select the “Preview” option to see the 200+ different combinations before you begin to bulk search
-- Quick Access Thesaurus: Quickly identifying additional words to input in the search fields using the Thesaurus feature
